PLOT:
Perfect Answer begins several months after the events of the first
film. Kurono (Ninomiya Kazunari) is still fighting aliens under the
order of Gantz, a mysterious giant black orb, and he is close to
reaching the score he needs to resurrect his friend Kato (Matsuyama
Kenichi). Outside his night time missions, Kurono continues to live
his normal life, spending time with his new girlfriend Tae (Yoshitaka
Yuriko). Meanwhile, young pop star Eriko (Ito Ayumi) is being secretly
ordered by Gantz to carry out assassinations, and cop Shigeta (Yamada
Takayuki) inches closer towards finding out the truth about the
Gantz missions. As the missions begin to get increasingly dangerous
for both the alien fighters and the general public, Kurono discovers
that the endgame for Gantz is quickly approaching
